de.crawcial.twitter.database

Class DatabaseService

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.crawcial.twitter.database.DatabaseService

  • public class DatabaseService
extends java.lang.Object
    This singleton class handles all database activities of Crawcial for Twitter.
    Author:
    Sebastian Lauber

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) java.util.concurrent.LinkedBlockingQueue<java.lang.Runnable> attachmentExecutors

      void forceShutdown()
      Forces a shutdown (clears queues and shuts down all workers).

      Returns the configured image download size.

      Returns the Crawcial for Twitter DatabaseService singleton.

      Returns the current outgoing vector to the database.

      Returns the warning count, that indicates the number of warning messages received from Twitter.

      This method must be called, if a message from Twitter does not contain a valid Tweet.

      Configures the DatabaseService singleton, must be called before the crawling process starts.

      Returns true, if the media downloader is enabled.

        public int getWarningCnt()
        Returns the warning count, that indicates the number of warning messages received from Twitter.
        Returns:
        warning count

      • increaseWarnings

        public void increaseWarnings()
        This method must be called, if a message from Twitter does not contain a valid Tweet.

      • init

        public void init(boolean downloadMedia,
                 org.lightcouch.CouchDbProperties dbProperties,
                 java.lang.String imgSize,
                 boolean mediaHttps)
        Configures the DatabaseService singleton, must be called before the crawling process starts.
        Parameters:
        downloadMedia - true, if media downloader enabled, false to disable media downloads
        dbProperties - CouchDB properties for the Crawcial Twitter Database
        imgSize - requested image size (thumb, small, medium, large)
        mediaHttps - true if https should be used for media downloads

      • isDownloadMedia

        public boolean isDownloadMedia()
        Returns true, if the media downloader is enabled.
        Returns:
        true, if the media downloader is enabled

      • isMediaHttps

        public boolean isMediaHttps()
        Returns true, if https should be used for media downloads.
        Returns:
        true, if https should be used for media downloads

      • loadAttachment

        void loadAttachment(com.google.gson.JsonObject status)
        Triggers an attachment download of the status.
        Parameters:
        status - Tweet for attachment download

      • shutdown

        public void shutdown()
              throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Initiates a proper shutdown.
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - if interrupted
